articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Aston Villa vs Celtic in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: Aston Villa vs Celtic: UEFA Champions League stats & head-to-head

articles.description: A much-changed Liverpool lose their 100% winning record in this season's Champions League after defeat to PSV Eindhoven in a five-goal thriller.
articles.title: PSV 3-2 Liverpool: Dutch side win thriller against Reds

articles.description: Ethan Nwaneri scores the winner as Arsenal beat Girona to qualify for the Champions League last 16
articles.title: Nwaneri shines as Arsenal reach Champions League last 16

articles.description: Real Madrid have to play Man City or Celtic in the Champions League play-offs after failing to finish in the top eight despite comfortably beating Brest.
articles.title: Brest vs Real Madrid Report: Real miss out on top eight despite beating Brest

articles.description: Ousmane Dembele's hat-trick helps Paris St-Germain into the Champions League play-offs as they thrash Stuttgart, a result that eliminates the Germans.
articles.title: Stuttgart 1-4 Paris St-Germain: PSG advance into play-offs as Germans eliminated

articles.description: Barcelona miss the chance to finish top of the league phase of the Champions League as they draw with Atalanta, who drop into the play-off round.
articles.title: Barcelona 2-2 Atalanta: Barca miss chance to finish top after draw

articles.description: Giuliano Simeone, son of manager Diego, scores once and sets up another as Atletico Madrid secure a place in the last 16 of the Champions League with a comprehensive victory over Red Bull Salzburg.
articles.title: Red Bull Salzburg 1-4 Atlético Madrid: Spanish side into last 16 in style

articles.description: Harry Kane helps Bayern Munich to beat Slovan Bratislava but victory is only good enough to earn the German club a play-off spot in the Champions League.
articles.title: Bayern Munich 3-1 Slovan Bratislava: Harry Kane scores as Bayern advance

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton is unhurt after crashing his Ferrari during the Formula 1 team's pre-season testing programme in Spain.
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton crashes Ferrari at pre-season test in Barcelona

articles.description: Last season's finalists Borussia Dortmund will have to win a play-off to reach the Champions League last-16 stage despite beating Shakhtar Donetsk.
articles.title: Borussia Dortmund 3-1 Shakhtar Donetsk: Serhou Guirassy double not enough as Germans face play-off
